data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mariño-Pérez, Ricardo, Dovgal, Igor, Mayén-Estrada, Rosaura (2011): New records of suctorians (Ciliophora: Suctoria) as epibionts of aquatic true bugs (Hemiptera: Prosorrhyncha: Nepomorpha) from two regions: Mexico and Eastern Europe. Zootaxa 2798: 48-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277026
